Title: Hong Kong LNG terminal awaits its second commercial cargo after vessel diversions
Description: The 4 mtpa Hong Kong offshore LNG receiving terminal is expected to receive its next commercial cargo on Jul. 14, after the vessel that was due to deliver its third cargo, or second post-commissioning cargo, diverted from Hong Kong to Chinaâ€™s 6.8 mtpa Dapeng LNG receiving terminal in China yesterday.
Author: CK
